document.full_text: former super bowl most valuable player hines ward was held at gunpoint by police in los angeles on thursday in a mix-up over a car mistakenly reported stolen, officials said.
document.title: nfl star hines ward held at gunpoint in police mix-up
lines_and_colors: former super bowl most valuable player hines ward was held at gunpoint by police in los angeles on thursday in a mix-up over a car mistakenly reported stolen, officials said.
